text.autoconfig.condensed_creative.title: CC Config
text.autoconfig.condensed_creative.optio: Enable Builtin Entries
Adds some Condensed Entries for certain internal minecraft Tags
Builtin Per Entry Config
Gives the ability to disable certain sections of Builtin Entries
Enchantment Books
Controls how Enchantment books will be partitioned as a condensed Entry
Tipped Arrows
Controls how Tipped Arrows will be partitioned as a condensed Entry
Potions
Controls how Potions will be partitioned as a condensed Entry
Enable Entry Refresh Button
Useful if something else is having issues being rendered behind within the creative screen as this button is more for debugging
Enable Entry Background Coloring
Would not recommend having this and outlines disabled as it will be hard to see the condensed entries.
Enable Entry Border Coloring
Would not recommend having this and backgrounds disabled as it will be hard to see the condensed entries.
Condensed Entry Border Coloring
Such a color is used when the Entry is open and gives the ability to change the exact color if needed
Enable Condensed Entry Rotation Preview
Enables the random rotation for the Icon of a Condensed Item Entry
Enable Tag Tooltip
Show Tag for the Condensed Entry
Enable Internal Identifier Tooltip
Show Identifier for the Condensed Entry
